participant_abstract.sent: Very efficent meeting, covered many constraintes from the management such as using the device for television only and to ignor teletext.
Project manager handled meeting well and everyone gave their individual presentations in a profesional manner.Lots of information was given discussed and new goals aimed for.

participant_actions.sent: Prepare presentations on out topics and futher discuss the project in terms of the design marketing and materials.

participant_decisions.sent: Device to be readicaly new design probably not flat but held upright.
Speech reconision to be used and limited functional buttons on the device.
Functions such as audio settings and other low usage requirtemtns to be dropped from final design.
Idea of 1 use, for x years then disposible when power source is used up.

participant_problems.sent: We have to resolve design and exact buttons to be used on the controler and deceide exactly what functionality is to be used and which is to be left out.
Final design how it is going to be marketed.
